00018 StringList StringList::setTypes(string str) {
00019         list.clear();
00020         StringList split = splitCommas(str);
00021         for(int i = 0; i < split.length(); ++i)
00022                 list.push_back(split[i]);

00045 string StringList::join(string glue) {
00046         string r = "";
00047         for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00048                 if(i > 0) r += glue;
00049                 r += list[i];
00050         }
00051         return r;
00052 }

00054 string StringList::join(string glue, int length) {
00055         string r = "";
00056         for(int i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
00057                 if(i > 0) r += glue;
00058                 r += list[i];
00059         }
00060         return r;

00063 string StringList::join(string glue, int start, int end) {
00064         string r = "";
00065         for(int i = start; i <= end; ++i) {
00066                 if(i > start) r += glue;
00067                 r += list[i];
00068         }
00069         return r;
00070 }

00072 string StringList::pop() {
00073         // get last element before destorying it
00074         string r = list[list.size() - 1];
00075         list.pop_back();
00076         return r;
